text: Karl Kuhn is an American college baseball coach and former catcher. He is the head baseball coach at Radford University. Kuhn played college baseball at Valencia Community College from 1987 to 1989 and at the University of Florida in 1990 for head coach Joe Arnold. ==Playing career== Kuhn attended Buchholz High School in Gainesville, Florida. He then enrolled at Valencia Community College, to play college baseball for the Matadors. After three years at Valencia, Kuhn played his final college season playing at the University of Florida. ==Coaching career== On August 22, 2019, Kuhn was named the head baseball coach at Radford University. ==Head coaching record== ==See also== * List of current NCAA Division I baseball coaches ==References== ==External links== *Karl Kuhn at The Baseball Cube *Radford Highlanders bio Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:Baseball catchers Category:Valencia Matadors baseball players Category:Florida Gators baseball players Category:High school baseball coaches in the United States Category:Valencia Matadors baseball coaches Category:Charleston Southern Buccaneers baseball coaches Category:Little Rock Trojans baseball coaches Category:Virginia Cavaliers baseball coaches Category:Radford Highlanders baseball coaches
title: Karl Kuhn (baseball)
